samudra-manthanam.description_short: Jyeshtha Devi (Kali wife), Varuni (Sesha wife), Sauparni (Garuda wife), Apsaras, Gandharvas, Airavata, Ucchaisrava, Dhanvantari, Parijatam, Kamadhenu born from Milk ocean

damanakArOpaNa-dvAdazI.description_short: Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden. Involves planting Damanaka trees.

damanaka-cOrI-utsavaH.description_short: Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden.

damanaka-caturdazI.description_short: Celebrating the stealing of Damanaka leaves by Jagannath Prabhu from Indra's garden.

zrI~hanUmat~jayantI~2.description_short: Hanuman born from Kaikeyi part of Payasam taken by Vulture and eaten by Anjana Devi

ta:citrA~paurNamI/citragupta~pUjai.Shloka:
citraguptaM mahAprAjJyaM lEkhanIpatradhAriNam .
citraratnAmbaradharaM madhyasthaM sarvadEhinAm ..

akSaya-tRtIyA.description_short: Daanam of Dadhyodanam, Vyanjanam, Chatram, Paduka, Udaka Kumbham, Mangos, Jackfruit; Lakshmi Narayana Pooja; Gouri Pooja;

rAja-mAtaGgI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Raja Matangi is 9th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

sarpa-pUjA~1.description_short: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day

gaGgA-saptamI.description_short: Ganga came out of Jahnu Maharshi and became Jahnavi; perform Parjanya Pooja

zarkarA-saptamI.description_short: Worship Surya Bhagavan in a vessel (`kumbha`) filled with sugar, followed by `dAnam` of the same.

purI gOvardhana-maTha-pratiSThApana~jaya.description_short: Adi Shankara founded Govardhan mutt, Puri in Nala year Padmapadacharya as first

kAJcI kAmakOTi-maTha-pratiSThApana~jayan.description_short: Adi Shankara founded Kamakoti Mutt, Kanchi in Siddharthi year with himself as first

vaizAkha-pUrNimA-snAnam.description_short: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.
vaizAkha-pUrNimA-snAnam.Shloka:
balaM rUpaM yazO dharmaM jJAnamAyuH sukhaM dhRtim .
ArOgyaM paramApnOti samyak snAnEna mAnavaH ..

nArada~jayantI.description_short: Avataram of `nArada muni`; perform danam of `vINA`, music

karavIra-vratam.description_short: Perform puja of `karavIra` plants/flowers and then offer them in `arcanA`.
karavIra-vratam.Shloka:
karavIra viSAvAsa namastE bhAnuvallabha.
maulimaNDana durgAdi dEvAnAM satataM priya

rambhA~tRtIyA.description_short: Rambha Vratam; perform Savitri pooja near Banana tree. Offer naivedyam of bananas prepared with ghee.
rambhA~tRtIyA.Shloka:
puSpamaNDapikA kAryA rambhAstambhOpazObhitA.
tatra sampUjayEddEvIM zaktyA svarNAdinirmitAm ..

vEdESu sarvazAstrESu divi bhUmau rasAtalE.
zrutO dRSTazca bahuzO na zaktyA rahitaH zivaH.
tvaM zakstistvaM svadhA svAhA tvaM sAvitrI sarasvatI.
patiM dEhi sutAndEhi gRhaM dEvi namO'stu tE..

 yOSitaH puruSO vA'pi khyAtaM rambhAvrataM bhuvi.
bhAryAM putraM gRhaM bhOgAn kulavRddhimavApnuyuH..

umA-avatAraH.description_short: Perform puja of Uma-Maheshvara, on the day of Uma Devi's Avataram.
umA-avatAraH.Shloka:
jyESThazuklacaturthyAM tu jAtA pUrvamumA satI.
tasmAt sA tatra sampUjyA strIbhiH saubhAgyavRddhayE..

kadalI-gaurI-vratam/pUjA.description_short: Perform puja of Shiva-Parvati under a banana tree or on a banana leaf, do naivedyam of 100+ bananas and give away to small girl children.
kadalI-gaurI-vratam/pUjA.Shloka:
putrAn dEhi dhanaM dEhi saubhAgyaM sarvamaGgalE.
saumaGgalyaM sukhaM jJAnaM dEhi mE zivasundari..

dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.description_short: Avataranam of Ganga Devi. Bathe in any river and offer arghyam â€” destroys 10 types of sins (`dazaharA`).
dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.Shloka:
dazamyAM zuklapakSE tu jyESThE mAsE kujE dinE.
gaGgA'vatIrNA hastarkSE sarvapApaharA smRtA..

yAM kAJcit saritaM prApya dadyAdarghyaM zubhOdakam .
mucyatE dazabhiH pApaiH sa mahApAtakOpamaiH..
dazaharA/gaGgAvataraNam/dazapApaharA~daz.titles: Ganga Jayanti; Dashapaapa-hara-dashami; Wednesday; Hasta star (Valmiki Ramayana)

gavAmayana-dvAdazI.description_short: Perform puja of Lord Trivikrama (Sahasranamarchana), do naivedyam of mangoes and offer annadanam to needy.
gavAmayana-dvAdazI.Shloka:
ahOrAtrENa dvAdazyAM jyESThE mAsi trivikramam .
gavAmayanamApnOti apsarObhizca mOdatE..

vaTa-pUrNimA/vaTa-sAvitrI-vratam.description_short: Perform puja of banyan tree; begets `saumaGgalyam` and `saubhAgyam`.

zAka-vratam (mahAlakSmI).description_short: Do danam of leafy vegetables (but do not consume, on this day)

dadhi-vratam (mahAlakSmI).description_short: Do danam of curd (but do not consume, on this day)

gOpadma-vrata-ArambhaH.Shloka:
gOpadmamiti vikhyAtaM sarvapApaharaM param .
sarvaduHkhOpazamanaM sarvasampatpradAyakam .
suvAsinyAstu saubhAgyaputrapautrapravardhanam ..

zAkavrata-ArambhaH.Shloka:
vAsudEva zucau mAsE zAkavratamanuttamam.
tvatprItyarthaM kariSyE'haM nirvighnaM kuru mAdhava..

zAkavrata-samApanam.Shloka:
vAsudEva namastubhyaM prathamE mAsi matkRtam.
zAkavrataM mayA tEna saMtuSTO bhava mAdhava..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

dadhi-vrata-ArambhaH.Shloka: saGkarSaNAravindAkSa kariSyE'haM dadhivratam. dvitIyE mAsi dEvEza nirvighnaM kuru mE prabhO..

dadhi-vrata-samApanam.Shloka:
saGkarSaNa namastubhyaM zravaNE matkRtEna ca.
 dadhivratEna dEvEza tuSTO bhava janArdana..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

payOvrata-ArambhaH.Shloka:
pradyumna tava tuSTyarthaM prOSTapadyAM tRtIyakE.
nirvighnaM kuru dEvEza kariSyE'haM payOvratam..

payOvrata-samApanam.Shloka: zrIpradyumna namastubhyaM mAsamArabhya yatkRtam. iSTadO bhava sarvEza gRhItvA tu payOvratam.. idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO. nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

dvidala-vrata-ArambhaH.Shloka:
aniruddha surairvandya dvidalavratamuttamam.
karOmyahamiSEmAsE nirvighnaM kuru mE prabhO..

dvidala-vrata-samApanam.Shloka:
aniruddha namastubhyaM dvidalAkhyavratEna ca. matkRtEnAzvinE mAsE prItyarthaM phaladO bhava..
idaM vrataM mayA dEva kRtaM prItyai tava prabhO.
nyUnaM sampUrNatAM yAtu tvatprasAdajjanArdana..

cAturmAsyavrata-ArambhaH.description_short: Chaaturmasya begins; 4 months; Pradakshina to Pippala; Deeparadhana in temple; Saraswati Pooja; 1st month no vegetables; 2nd month no curds; 3rd month no milk; 4th month no dals;

guru-pUrNimA/vyAsa-pUjA.description_short: Puja of Veda Vyasa / Gurus; Danam of Vishnu Puran is good on this day.
guru-pUrNimA/vyAsa-pUjA.Shloka: acaturvadanO brahmA dvibAhuraparO hariH. aphAlalOcanO zambhurbhagavAn bAdArAyaNaH..

kOkila-vratam.description_short: Pooja of Kokila for getting good husband/wife.

ASADha-pUrNimA-snAnam.description_short: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

azUnyazayana-vratam~1.description_short: Lord Mahavishnu sleeps with Goddess Mahalakshmi on this day. Do Puja by placing the God/Goddess on a new bed with pillow/blanket. Do danam of same after puja.
azUnyazayana-vratam~1.Shloka:
lakSmyA viyujyatE dEva na kadAcit yatO bhavAn .
tathA kalatrasambandhO dEva mA mE viyujyatAm ..

dUrvA-gaNapati-vratam.description_short: Perform puja of Ganapati with `dUrvA` grass

garuDa-paJcamI.description_short:
* Day Garuda brought Amrutam for Nagas
* Day Garuda and Takshaka fought and compromise was struck with Takshaka as garland in Garuda's neck (peace treaty :)

nAga-paJcamI.description_short: Naga Panchami; SarpaPooja (manasaDevi); Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day
nAga-paJcamI.Shloka:
apasarpa sarpa bhadraM tE dUraM gaccha mahAyazAH .
janamEjayasya yajJAntE astIkavacanaM smaran ..

hayagrIva~jayantI.description_short: Lord Hayagriva did upadesham of all four vedas to Brahma.
hayagrIva~jayantI.Shloka:
OGkArOdgItharUpAya RgyajussAmamUrtayE.
namO'studEvadEvAya vAcchitArthapradAyinE..
ajJAnatimiraM chindhi jJAnaM ca''zu prayaccha mE.
dEhi mE dEva dEvEza hayazIrSa namO'stu tE..

saMskRta-divasaH.description_short: World Sanskrit Day is celebrated on this day.

zrI~rAghavEndra~svAmI~ArAdhanA.Shloka:
pujyAya rAghavEndrAya satyadharmaratAya ca.
bhajatAM kalavRkSAya namatAM kAmadhEnavE..

mahAkAlI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Mahakali is 1st of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

vRSabha-pUjA.description_short: Vrushabha puja; Nandi born to Shilaada on this day

lakSmI-varAha~jayantI.Shloka:
jitaM jitaM tE'jita yajJabhAvana trayIM tanuM svAM paridhunvatE namaH.
yadrOmagartESu nililyuraddhayastasmai namaH kAraNasUkarAya tE..3-13-35..
—zrImadbhAgavatE mahApurANE tRtIyEskandhE trayOdazE'dhyAyE

haritAlikA-vratam.description_short: Puja of Gauri-Maheshwara on Vrishabham, esp. for girls desirous of getting married, like Goddess Parvati sought the hand of Maheshwara, as Himavan's daughter.

sUrya-SaSThI.description_short: Perform puja of Surya, eat Panchagavya -- brings merits greater than Ashvamedha!
sUrya-SaSThI.Shloka:
zuklE bhAdrapadE SaSThyAM snAnaM bhAskarapUjanam .
 prAzanaM paJcagavyasya azvamEdhaphalAdhikam ..

vitastOtsavaH.description_short: 7 days bath in Vitasta river tributary of Narmada

vAmana~jayantI.description_short: Wednesday Shravana ; Vamana Jayanti; Shravana Dvadashi; Vijaya Dvadashi; Shakra Dvadashi

bhuvanEzvarI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Bhuvaneshwari is 4th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
bhuvanEzvarI~jayantI.Shloka:
udyadinadyutimindukirITAm tuGgakucAM nayanatrayayuktAM 
smEramukhIM varadAGkuzapAzAbhItikarAm prabhajE bhuvanEzIm

ananta-dvAdazI.description_short: Vanjuli (Cow giving lots of milk), dugdha (milk), Aviyoga, Ananta Dvadashi

vizvarUpa-yAtrA.description_short: Shankaracharyas will resume their travel, after being stationed for Chaturmasya vratam for the last four pakshas.

kapila-SaSThI.Shloka:
prabhAkara namastubhyaM saMsArAnmAM samuddhara.
 bhuktimuktipradO yasmAt tasmAcchAntiM prayaccha mE..

jImUtavAhana-pUjA~1.description_short: Jeemuutavahana is an atma-tyagi vidyadhara Chakravarti. Saved Shankhachuda's (Naaga) life by offering himself to Garuda. From that day Garuda stopped eating snakes.

kaMsa-vadhaH.description_short: Lord Krishna killed Kamsa on this day; most popularly celebrated in Mathura and Uttar Pradesh.

sumaGgalI~navamI.description_short: In honour of Sumangalis (in the family), by holding a feast for Suvasinis and Kanyas.
sumaGgalI~navamI.Shloka:
bharturagrE mRtA nArI sahadAhEna vA mRtA .
 tasyAH sthAnE niyuJjIta vipraiH saha suvAsinIm ..

dauhitra-pratipat.description_short: Grandson must seek blessings of his maternal grandparents, and bestow gifts.

patrikA-pravEza-pUjA.description_short: Pooja of Kapila cow, eat only Panchagavya, next day eat

mahAnavamI/sarasvatI-pUjA.description_short:
Daanam is good, get crore times punya.
MaatruNavami, NaamaNavami Vratam, DurgaNavami-Vratam, Shourya-Vratam, Mahaaphala Vratam, PradeeptaNavami

vijayadazamI.description_short:
Arjuna wins over all Kauravas and Karna
Sri Rama's army built tents on ocean bank before crossing on Shravana star (AnandaRamayanam)
Best day for AksharaaBhyaasam

ta:Ayudha~pUjai.description_short: Arjuna wins over all Kauravas and Karna. Worship of all weapons, or rather, tools related to one's profession.

madhvAcArya~jayantI.description_short: Jayanti of Madhvacharya, a proponent of Dvaita Vedanta

kO-jAgarti-vratam.description_short: Have to play Aksha kreeda only on this day and Ko-jagarti-Vratam (Lakshmi will ask "who are awake"). Vaalakhilya Rushi mentioned Ko-jagarti Vratam
kO-jAgarti-vratam.Shloka:
nizIthE varadA lakSmIH kO jAgartIti bhASiNI.
tasmai vittaM prayacchAmi akSaiH krIDAM karOti yaH..

kuntI~(pArvatI)-vratam.description_short: Kunti-vratam done today will remove all paapams (including Gohatya). As per Bhavishyottara Puraana. Here Kunti means Parvati. Also, some people worship Yudhisthira's mother Kunti. In AP/TEL, eldest child is given new clothes, harti and blessed "Deerghayushman".

candrOdaya-gaurI-vratam.description_short: Attla-Taddi (Telugu). After moonrise, Uma devi pooja; From this day to Deepaavali eat more Urad dal

dhanvantari~jayantI.description_short: Dhanvantari Jayanti (born as Divodaas King of Kaashi) as per Brahmanda-Puraana (Dvadashi?)

(yama)-dIpa-trayOdazI.description_short: Do `dAnaM` of `dIpam`, light deepam outside the house.
(yama)-dIpa-trayOdazI.Shloka:
AzvinasyAsitE pakSE trayOdazyAM nizAmukhE.
yamadIpaM bahirdadyAt apamRtyurvinazyati..

mRtyunA pAzadaNDAbhyAM kAlEna zyAmayA saha.
trayOdazyAM dIpadAnAt sUryajaH prIyatAM mama..

naraka-caturdazI.description_short:
*ShriKrishna killed Muraasura and Narakaasura on this day.
*Must do Taila-abhyangana-snaanam in early morning before sunrise, else Narakam (as per PadmaPurana) . If done, equal to GangaSnanam and avoids YamaYaatanam. Use water stored from previous day. Previous day night do pooja to water. Use this water on Chaturdashi. With plough uproot Upaamaarga-vruksham (small one) and put in the water. (DO NOT PLUCK WITH HAND). Do dhyaanam of Seeta.
* As per KalikaPuranam, Naraka was also upraised by Janaka. He was then sent to PraajyotishaPuram.

dIpOtsava-caturdazI/yama-tarpaNam.description_short: Perform Tarpana to Yamadharmaraja (even those with father). `jIvatpitA'pi kurvIta tarpaNaM yamabhISmayoH`

prEta-caturdazI.description_short: Perform Deepa Danam for Yamadharmaraja in evening

dIpAvalI/lakSmI-kubEra-pUjA.description_short: Gives light even to Naraka-vasis; Also, Bali was sent to Paatalam on this day.

gOvardhana-pUjA.description_short: Commemoration of Govardhana Leela of Krishna. Offer naivedyam to Lord Krishna.

sarpa-pUjA~2.description_short: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day

Adi-zaGkara mAnasika-sannyAsa-dinam.description_short: In Plava Nama year Adi Shankara obtained permission from mother and took manasika sanyasam

kArtika-pUrNimA-snAnam.description_short: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

dattAtrEya~jayantI.Shloka:
Adau brahmA madhyE viSNurantE dEvaH sadAzivaH.
mUrtitrayasvarUpAya dattAtrEya namO'stu tE..

zRGgErI 32 jagadguru zrI nRsiMha bhAratI.Shloka:
prahlAdavaradO dEvO yO nRsiMhaH parO hariH.
nRsiMhOpAsakaM nityaM taM nRsiMhaH guruM bhajE..

zRGgErI 34 jagadguru zrI candrazEkhara b.Shloka:
sadA''tmadhyAnanirataM viSayEbhyaH paraGmukham .
naumi zAstrESu niSNAtaM candrazEkharabhAratIm ..

zRGgErI 35 jagadguru zrI abhinava vidyAt.Shloka:
vivEkinaM mahAprAjJyaM dhairyaudAryakSamAnidhim .
sadA'bhinavapUrvaM taM vidyAtIrthaguruM bhajE ..

zRGgErI 34 jagadguru zrI candrazEkhara b.Shloka:
sadA''tmadhyAnanirataM viSayEbhyaH paraGmukham .
naumi zAstrESu niSNAtaM candrazEkharabhAratIm ..

zRGgErI 35 jagadguru zrI abhinava vidyAt.Shloka:
vivEkinaM mahAprAjJyaM dhairyaudAryakSamAnidhim .
sadA'bhinavapUrvaM taM vidyAtIrthaguruM bhajE ..

trailaGga-svAmI~jayantI.description_short: Paramahamsa described Him as "walking Shiva of Varanasi"

mArgazIrSa-zivaliGga-SaSThI.description_short: Have darshan of Shivalingam today; removes Shivapachara doshas in the family.
mArgazIrSa-zivaliGga-SaSThI.Shloka:
mArgazIrSE'malE pakSE SaSThyAM vArEM'zumAlinaH .
zatatArAgatE candrE liGgaM syAddRSTigOcaram .

mitra-saptamI.description_short: Birth of Surya to Aditya-Kashyapa on this day.
mitra-saptamI.Shloka:
adityAM kazyapAjjajJE mitrO nAma divAkaraH.
saptamyAM tEna sA khyAtA lOkE'smin mitrasaptamI..

badarI jyOtirmaTha-pratiSThApana~jayantI.description_short: Adi Shankara founded Jyotir Mutt, Badarinath in Rakshasa year Totakacharya as first

zRGgErI zAradAmaTha-pratiSThApana~jayant.description_short: Adi Shankara founded Sharada Mutt, Shringeri in Pingala year Sureshwaracharya as first

tyAgarAja-ArAdhanA.Shloka:
kAmakrOdhAdirahitaM rAmabhaktazirOmaNim .
tyAgarAjaguruM vandE saGgItAbdhiM kalAnidhim ..

vanadurgAnavarAtri-ArambhaH.description_short: Vanadurga Navaratri. Specially celebrated in Karthiramangalam.

zyAmaLAnavarAtri-ArambhaH.description_short: Shyamala Devi specially blesses musicians; honour musicians in this period.

varakunda-caturthI.Shloka:
mAghazuklacaturthyAM tu kundapuSpaiH sadAzivam .
sampUjya yO hi naktA''zI samprApnOti zriyaM naraH ..

sarpa-pUjA.description_short: Vishnu's boon to AdiSesha that humans will worship on this day.

zrIrAma-vanavAsa-gamanam.description_short: Afternoon Shri Raama started to go to the forests/exile.

vasanta-zrI-paJcamI.description_short: Worship Mahavishnu and Mahalakshmi, Rati Devi and Manmatha with jasmine flowers.
vasanta-zrI-paJcamI.Shloka:
mAghamAsE nRpazrESTha zuklAyAM paJcamItithau.
ratikAmau tu sampUjya kartavyaH sumahOtsavaH..

dvArakA-maTha-pratiSThApana~jayantI.description_short: Adi Shankara founded Dwaraka Mutt in Sadharana year with HastamalakaAcharya as first

bhISmASTamI.description_short: Bhishma obtained mukti on this day; offer tarpana to Bhishma (even those with parents). Brings health, long life and harmony in family.

vanadurgAnavarAtri-samApanam.description_short: Vanadurga Navaratri. Specially celebrated in Karthiramangalam.

tilapadma-dvAdazI/tilOtpatti.description_short: Mahavishnu created black til by extreme `tapas` on this day; light til deepam and offer `tilAnnam naivedyam`.
tilapadma-dvAdazI/tilOtpatti.Shloka:
mAghE tu zukladvAdazyAM yatO hi bhagavAn pura.
tilAn utpAdayAmAsa tapaH kRtvA sudAruNam ..
tilatailEna dIpAzcha dEyAh dEva gRhESu ca.
nivEdayEt tilAnEva

lalitA~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Lalita is 3rd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

mAgha-pUrNimA-snAnam.description_short: Perform snana four ghatikas before sunrise (during `aruNodayam`, when the Moon is still up, on the full-moon days of `ASADha`, `kArtika`, `mAgha` and `vaizAkha` – hence the name `A-kA-mA-vai`) bestows strength, beauty, fame, dharma, knowledge, happiness, fortitude and health.

AgrayaNa~hOmaH~1.description_short: Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.

AgrayaNa~hOmaH~2.description_short: Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.

AgrayaNa~hOmaH~3.description_short: Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.

AgrayaNa~hOmaH~4.description_short: Perform `homa' with fresh rice from paddy.

sEGgAlipuram anantarAma-dIkSita-ArAdhanA.description_short: Aradhana Day of Sri Anantarama Dikshitar.

ta:ADik~kiruttikai.description_short: Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples.

ta:vaikAci~vizAkham.description_short: Special puja for Subrahmanya Swami in temples. Birth of Subrahmanya Swami. Worship Him with red flowers.

ta:tiruvADippUram.Shloka:
zrIviSNucitta-kulakalpakanandavallIm
zrIraGgarAja-hari-candana-yOga-drzyAm .
sAkSAt kSamAM karuNayA kamalAmivAnyAM
gOdAm ananyazaraNaH zaraNaM prapadyE..

ta:ArudrA~darican2am/naTarAjar mahAbhiSE.description_short: Visit Chidambaram to have darshan of Nataraja, or pray to Nataraja
ta:ArudrA~darican2am/naTarAjar mahAbhiSE.Shloka:
kRpAsamudram sumukhaM trinEtraM sadAzivaM rudramanantarUpam .
jaTAdharaM pArvativAmabhAgaM cidambarEzaM hRdi bhAvayAmi ..

pUntAnaM~jayantI.description_short: Poonthanam, a great devotee of Guruvayurappan, enriched Malayalam devotional literature with his renowned poetic composition 'Jnanapana', a philosophical work of all times. On this day, recital of Poonthanam's works and debate takes place. A one week literary festival is conducted at Poonthanam illam.

zrI~zESAdri-svAmI~jayantI.Shloka:
karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .
zrIzESAdriguruM vandE brahmIbhUtaM tapOnidhim ..

zrI~zESAdri-svAmI~ArAdhanA.Shloka:
karuNAsAgaraM zAntam aruNAcalavAsinam .
zrIzESAdriguruM vandE brahmIbhUtaM tapOnidhim ..

ta:mayilai~veLLIzvarar~brahmOtsavam.description_short: Enactment of restoration of eyesight of Shukracharya.

kRttikA-maNDala-pArAyaNam.description_short: Conduct veda parayanam in the evening, on one of these 48 days.

ta:undu~madakkaLir2r2an2{}.description_short: Offer naivedyam of `citrAnnam` (tamarind rice) to Vishnu

ta:kUDAravallI.description_short: Offer naivedyam of `gudAnnam` to Vishnu, as mentioned in the Tiruppavai 27

nArAyaNIyaM~jayantI.description_short: Celebration of completion of Narayaniyam (762 CE), in Guruvayur temple.

ta:kar2avaigaL pin2cen2r2u.description_short: Offer naivedyam of `dadhyodanam` to Vishnu, for Tiruppavai 28

makara-jyOtiH.description_short: Darshan of Makara Jyoti in Sabarimala Ayyappa Temple.

SaDazIti-mithunaraviH.description_short: Perform danam of clothes, food and water.

viSNupadI-siMharaviH.description_short: Perform danam of ghee, milk vessel, "ghee cow" and fruits.
viSNupadI-siMharaviH.Shloka:
ghRtaM ca kSIrakumbhazca ghRtadhEnu phalAni ca.
zrAvaNE zrIdharaprItyai dAtavyAni vipazcitA..

SaDazIti-kanyAraviH.description_short: Perform danam of clothes/place to live.

tulA-viSu-puNyakAlaH.description_short: Perform danam of rice/wheat/grains and cow ghee/curd etc.

SaDazIti-dhanurraviH.description_short: Perform danam of clothes/vehicle (e.g. bullock cart).

viSNupadI-kumbharaviH.description_short: Perform danam of hay, grass, food and pure water to cows.
viSNupadI-kumbharaviH.Shloka: kumbhapravEzE dAnaM tu gavaM ambu tRNasya ca

dvAdaza-saptamI.description_short: Surya Puja, Danam to please Surya Bhagavan

dAmOdara-dvAdazI.description_short: Perform Vishnu Pratima Danam, Sridhara Puja

nArikEla-pUrNimA.description_short: Offer coconut to sea God Varuna

vaizAkha-snAnapUrtiH.Shloka:
mAdhavE mESagE bhAnau murArE madhusUdana.
prAtaH snAnEna mE nAtha phaladO bhava pApahan ..

tiruvizalUr gaGgAkarSaNa-mahOtsava-samAp.description_short: Thiruvisanallur Sridhara Aiyyaval brought Ganga to his house well on this day! See also http://www.sriayyaval.org/ .
tiruvizalUr gaGgAkarSaNa-mahOtsava-samAp.Shloka:
IzE tasya ca nAmani pravimalaM jJAnaM tayOrUrjitam
prEma prEma ca tatparESu viratizcAnyatra sarvatra ca.
IzEkSA karuNA ca yasya niyatA vRttiH zritasyApi yam
taM vandE nararUpamantakaripuM zrIvEGkaTEzaM gurum..

satyanArAyaNa~jayantI.description_short: Satyanarayana Swami Jayanti is celebrated in Annavaram Satya Narayana Temple, Andhra Pradesh

bagalAmukhI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Bagalamukhi is 8th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

dhUmAvatI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Dhumavati is 7th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

chinnamastA~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Chinnmasta is 6th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

tripura~bhairavI~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Tripura Bhairavi is 5th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

mahAtArA~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Mahatara is 2nd of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.

kamalA~jayantI.description_short: Goddess Kamala is 10th of the Dasha Maha Vidyas.
